edu.belmont.mth.visigraph.models.generators
Interface Generator

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmptyGraph
public interface Generator

The Generator interface defines the minimal implementation requirements of graph-generating algorithms.

Author:
Cameron Behar

Nested Class Summary
static class Generator.Attribute
          A code representing a known generator attribute
static class Generator.BooleanRule
          A boolean rule indicating whether an action should be allowed or prohibited, and whether or not this rule can be overridden
 
Method Summary
 Graph generate(java.lang.String params, boolean areLoopsAllowed, boolean areDirectedEdgesAllowed, boolean areMultipleEdgesAllowed, boolean areCyclesAllowed, java.awt.Component owner)
          Generates a graph from the specified parameters and rules.
 java.lang.Object getAttribute(Generator.Attribute attribute)
          Returns the specified attribute of this Generator.
 

Method Detail

generate

Graph generate(java.lang.String params,
               boolean areLoopsAllowed,
               boolean areDirectedEdgesAllowed,
               boolean areMultipleEdgesAllowed,
               boolean areCyclesAllowed,
               java.awt.Component owner)
Generates a graph from the specified parameters and rules.

Parameters:
params - a String of parameters for the generation algorithm
areLoopsAllowed - a boolean indicating whether or not loops are to be allowed in the graph
areDirectedEdgesAllowed - a boolean indicating whether the graph is to be directed or undirected
areMultipleEdgesAllowed - a boolean indicating whether or not multi-edges are to be allowed in the graph
areCyclesAllowed - a boolean indicating whether or not cycles are to be allowed in the graph
owner - a Component used to show modal dialogs requesting more parameters from the user, if necessary
Returns:
the newly generated Graph object

getAttribute

java.lang.Object getAttribute(Generator.Attribute attribute)
Returns the specified attribute of this Generator. All implementations must return values for, at least:

  • ARE_LOOPS_ALLOWED
  • ARE_MULTIPLE_EDGES_ALLOWED
  • ARE_DIRECTED_EDGES_ALLOWED
  • ARE_CYCLES_ALLOWED
  • ARE_PARAMETERS_ALLOWED

... and if the ARE_PARAMETERS_ALLOWED attribute is set to true:

  • PARAMETERS_DESCRIPTION
  • PARAMETERS_VALIDATION_EXPRESSION

Parameters:
attribute - the queried Generator.Attribute
Returns:
an Object representing the value for this Generator's specified attribute
